ora_events.name: problem_id
ora_events.description: The ID of the problem whose open assessment is reported

ora_events.name: time
ora_events.description: Timestamp associated with the open assessment event on the edX platform

ora_events.name: course_id
ora_events.description: Course ID in the standard format as org/number/semester

ora_events.name: action
ora_events.description: The open assessment action taken by the user

ora_events.name: submission_uuid
ora_events.description: The UUID associated with the open assessment action/event

ora_events.name: part1_points
ora_events.description: The points given in part 1 of the open assessment

ora_events.name: part1_feedback
ora_events.description: The feedback given in part 1 of the open assessment

ora_events.name: attempt_num
ora_events.description: Number of times an attempt was made to create/submit the open assessment

ora_events.name: module_id_sometimes
ora_events.description: An unreliable version of the module associated with the submitted item

ora_events.name: event_type
ora_events.description: The type of event triggered. Values depend on event_source.

ora_events.name: event
ora_events.description: A stringified/dumped JSON object that contains the ID and current time associated with the tracked event

ora_events.name: event_source
ora_events.description: The source of the event (server, browser, mobile, etc.)

ora_events.name: last_module_id
ora_events.description: The latest module ID associated with the item being assessed

ora_events.name: module_id
ora_events.description: The supposed module ID associated with the item being assessed

description: Table generated with SQL query file ora_events.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It holds all the openassessment events extracted from the tracking logs for a course.
